p: Debbache et al., examined, in vitro the antioxidant effects of poplar bud extracts (Algeria). Seven fractions were used (ethanol, ethyl acetate, aqueous of ethyl acetate, hexane, aqueous of hexane, chloroform and aqueous of chloroform), which were obtained by a selective extraction procedure. Results showed that the aqueous chloroform fraction extract had the highest antioxidant capacity [ 53].
